content:
@Kyle Miller thanks for the solution! I actually realised why I wasn't able to apply any tactic, I wasn't using by I somehow forgot that I need to add by. But I also didn't know about the functional program proof using match. Also thanks for explaining the Decidable typeclass.

@Kevin Buzzard , yeah I think I need to work through the exercises. Thanks for pointing out where std4 is I've starred your message to remember what the name is
